title: Full screen mode to browser window instead of to monitor
content: I was wondering if while playing a video, is there a way to full screen to the size of the browser window instead of to the full screen of the display device? A lot of the time i want to have multiple windows open and play a tv show or movie in the browser windows while I perform other tasks in other applications. But I would like the tv show or movie to use the entire screen of the browser window as if it was in fullscreen mode but limited to only the size of the browser window and not the entire display device.
creator: dgrim67

title: Mail fails to send "Authentication required" in Thunderbird 115.1.1 (64 Bit)
content: I I can receive mail but cannot send. I had no problems until ver. 115 was installed. Now I get The authentication required message. I'm using Comcast as my provider. I have looked at this problem in earlier versions, but following the suggestions hasn't helped. I've checked that all the email addresses are correct. I have 3 Comcast email addresses I use and I have set the Outgoing Server to match each email address. I have also gone to Comcast and checked the box allowing 3rd party email apps.
creator: jds1239

title: Bookmarks
content:
I guess I don't know how to frame the problem.

I want to access a bookmark but it appears that the box on the left of the screen is full, or at least at the limit the box can display.

So far posing a question to help is futile.

All I want to do is be able to access all of my bookmarks.
creator: mcloughlinbill6
